channel.title: Removing trade screen prices? PLEASE HELP
channel.description: how do i remove the trade screen prices..i want to make it so stores have there own prices but when u trade someone...the item ur trading doesent have a price..like is there a way to completley take that trade value bar off? im using hybrid pvp v3 thanks!

item.title: Removing trade screen prices? PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Client sided, I can’t remember where I changed it at. Just use your search program that should be at the bottom, called “zfilesearcher” or something. Search for the words. Make sure you capitalize what needs to be capitalized as it is case sensitive.
